# tf.test.gpu_device_name

Returns the name of a GPU device if available or the empty string.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/test/gpu_device_name"><code>tf.compat.v1.test.gpu_device_name</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/test/gpu_device_name"><code>tf.compat.v2.test.gpu_device_name</code></a>


``` python
tf.test.gpu_device_name()
```
